title: Project yi's dance not scaling with movement speed.
body:
So I was playing a game as project yi, and I bought home guards because I wanted to see that sweet dance at 5x speed.
Interestingly though it doesn't appear to scale with movement speed. Riot please fix, you added this in 5.17 and I was super excited to see the project yi dance in 5x speed. Obviously this is just a bug, shouldn't bee too hard to patch.

replies.body:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/7GEi9Q45-project-master-yi-dance-doesnt-scale-with-movement-speed?comment=0000

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=7GEi9Q45,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-02T18:07:15.151+0000)
> 
> This is intentional. PROJECT: Yi's dance isn't meant to scale with movement speed. We did this because this skin has its own unique dance.
Alright. Thanks for clarifying. Great skin overall though.
